name: Distilling and Smelting
description: Likely the first machine the aspiring witch will obtain, the Witches' Oven can burn certain reagents down to special fumes, and can produce a range of secondary products. If a Witches' Oven is given Clay Jars, it will collect the produced fumes. The jar is only needed if the outpute is a fume. On top of that, it may be used to produce various cooked foods.
